Html:
I've download Prism which includes its documents but it is in chm format. When I print this document, it's hard to read. I want to know is there exist document in pdf format? if so where can I download it?

Thanks.

Hi,

Thanks for your feedback. The Prism v4 documentation is only provided in the CHM format so far. As someone interested on this I think that you would like to know that there is a related post in the issue tracker:

  • Request : Supplying PDF instead of CHM (for ebook readers for example)

This allows you to vote on this topic. The more votes it gets, the greater the possibility to be part of the final release (or future versions).

Please let me know if this helps.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
I have voted this request up, hope it active soon. :)
